title: [1508521049] Pro Cyclist Special With Adam Hansen | Ask GCN Anything About Cycling
description:
In this special edition of Ask GCN Anything, we're joined by Australian Pro Cyclist Adam Hansen of team Lotto-Soudal. Dan Lloyd and Adam answer your #torqueback questions, from pro team tactics to tackling saddle sores! 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/l-
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/lZ

Adam Hansen is best known for his phenomenal record breaking streak of Grand Tours, currently standing at 18 consecutive finishes at the Tour de France, Giro d'Italia and Vuelta a España since 2011.

Loyal domestique, yet with several stage wins to his name as well as twice winner of the Australian self supported MTB Crocodile Trophy, Hansen is an impressive athlete.

asset.title: Pro Cyclist Special With Adam Hansen | Ask GCN Anything About Cycling
asset.description:
In this special edition of Ask GCN Anything, we're joined by Australian Pro Cyclist Adam Hansen of team Lotto-Soudal. Dan Lloyd and Adam answer your #torqueback questions, from pro team tactics to tackling saddle sores! 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/l-
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/lZ

Adam Hansen is best known for his phenomenal record breaking streak of Grand Tours, currently standing at 18 consecutive finishes at the Tour de France, Giro d'Italia and Vuelta a España since 2011.

Loyal domestique, yet with several stage wins to his name as well as twice winner of the Australian self supported MTB Crocodile Trophy, Hansen is an impressive athlete. 🔥

Yet more than just a rider, Engineer Hansen has also turned his hand to a number of different enterprises including making his own super lightweight shoes. 

In this week's Ask GCN, Dan LLoyd poses your questions to Adam, as we gain further understanding of life in the pro peloton. Anything you'd love to know that you think we've missed? Pop your questions in the comments below! 👇


If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/lY

Watch more on GCN...
Take a look inside Adam Hansen's suitcase 📹  http://gcn.eu/1nGMXBs
From the depths of the archives - rider diaries Vuelta 2013  📹  http://gcn.eu/Vuelta2013

Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
